basics.name: Reece Robinson
basics.label: Programmer
basics.summary: I'm a lifelong Alaskan. I take pride in my ability to quickly learn and adapt to different environments. While earning a Bachelor's and Minor in southern New Mexico, I extensively self-taught web technologies. I follow the bleeding-edge trends and am always trying to dip my toes into something new. I'm interested in learning every day through writing code. Upon graduation in December 2015, I seek immediate employment.

work.summary: I've worked for Vinney on and off for 2 years. Most of my work involved building, fixing and maintaining complex user interfaces for an in-house SaaS. Most recently, I helped migrate an existing RequireJS codebase to Webpack-handled bundling.
Set up Wordpress-hosted sites for local Alaska businesses. Learned a lot about Wordpress plugins and sharpened my SASS skills.

awards.title: NOLS Alumni
awards.summary: 28-day backpacking adventure through the Talkeetna mountains. Used topological maps to navigate to ration points until catching a train back home. Learned leadership, cooperation, and survival skills. Inquire for more details.

awards.title: 2nd Place Coding Competition
awards.summary: A language-agnostic coding competition for groups of 1-3 NMSU students. I competed solo.
